name: Re-Play Spill-Proof Sippy Cups for Toddlers - Kids Reusable 10 Oz Set of 3, Dishwasher & Microwave Safe, Made in USA, A True Blue

product_details: Included Components 3 Re-Play Cup Bases, 3 Re-Play No Spill Lids, 3 Re-Play Once Piece Silicone Valves

Product Care Instructions Dishwasher Safe - keep away from heating element, Wash each piece separately, Red Sauces and certain foods can stain plastic - To prevent staining from Red sauces and other like foods, wash thoroughly before dishwashing, we recommend washing with a grease cutting dish soap like Dawn IMMEDIATELY after use! name: Nuby Clik-It Soft Spout No-Spill Easy Grip Sippy Cup for Girls - (3-Pack) 10 Oz - 6+ Months
short_description: SIPPY CUP FOR KIDS 6+ MONTHS: Nuby's Clik-It Soft Spout Sippy Cup holds up to 10 ounces (300 ml) of water, milk, or juice; It's the perfect cup for spill-prone babies at home or on the go

SOFT SPOUT NO-SPILL SIPPY CUP: The soft silicone spout is gentle on gums and teeth; The built-in TOUCH-FLO valve only opens when your child sips, preventing spills and leaks; The Clik-It lid helps transition into independent drinking
DESIGNED FOR LITTLE HANDS: Clik-It No Spill Soft Spout Sippy Cup's perfectly proportioned design and contoured cup base makes gripping easy and comfortable for little hands
FUN COLORS AND DESIGNS: This set of three training cups includes one blue cup, one pink cup, and one purple cup
EASY TO CLEAN: The Nuby Clik-It No-Spill Soft Spout Sippy Cup is top-rack dishwasher safe for an easy, convenient cleanup parents will love
SAFETY FIRST: Parents can feel safe knowing Nuby baby sippy cups are developed, researched, and manufactured to exceed all government safety regulations and standards
product_description: The Nuby Clik-It No-Spill Soft Spout Cup offers leakproof technology that you can see and hear, so you don't have to worry about spills and leaks. As you twist the lid into place, it “clicks” so you know it's securely attached to the cup base. Hear the "click" and know it's locked! Designed for babies 6+ months, the Nuby Clik-It No-Spill Soft Spout Sippy Cup features a soft silicone spout that is gentle on children's teeth and gums. The soft spout is designed with our pressure-sensitive TOUCH-FLO valve to help prevent drips and spills. The TOUCH-FLO valve regulates fluid intake as children drink from the Nuby spout cup, opening only with the pressure from their mouth. The valve closes when your little one isn't sipping from the spout, ensuring a leak-resistant cup and helping your little one transition from baby bottles to cups. Each cup holds up to 10 ounces (300 ml) of liquid and has an Easy Grip base that is contoured for little hands. This set of three Nuby sippy cups includes one blue cup, one pink cup, and one purple cup. Avoid messy spills and leaks, and encourage independent drinking with this Nuby sippy cup!
product_details: Special Feature ‎Dishwasher safe Top Rack Only

Product Care Instructions ‎Clean before initial use and after each subsequent use. Disassemble all parts prior to washing. Dishwasher safe (top rack only), or hand wash in warm water using mild liquid soap and rinse thoroughly with clean water. Dry thoroughly. Can be boiled and steam sterilized.
Finish Type ‎Plastic or silicone standard finish
Additional product features ‎Dishwasher safe Top Rack Only

product_description: No more worrying over spills and leaks! Nuby’s Clik-It Soft Spout Trainer Cup's lid "clicks" when twisted into place, so parents know it’s securely attached to the cup base. Nuby’s Clik-It Soft Spout Trainer Cup has a soft silicone spout designed to prevent drips, spills, and messes. Active little ones are animated, even while holding (or dropping) their drinks. That’s why Nuby designed a cup spout with a pressure-sensitive TOUCH-FLO valve. As children sip on the spout, the TOUCH-FLO valve opens to allow liquid through. When sipping stops, the TOUCH-FLO valve closes, ensuring a leak-resistant cup. The 2-handle design makes it easy for little hands to grasp and hold the cup. Whether your little one sits still or keeps moving and shaking while sipping, Nuby has you covered.

product_description: Product Description Let's face it: Toddlers are a messy bunch, especially when first navigating Sippy cups. Now imagine a world in which drinks didn't spill at all not in your diaper bag, not on your furniture, and not even onto your eager to learn child. No, it's not a miracle, exactly it's munchkin's miracle 360˚ cup. The first Sippy cup invented with both parents and kids in mind, the miracle 360˚ Sippy cup eliminates messes and supports kids' dental health all at once. Drinking from anywhere around the rim, like a regular cup, helps support normal muscle development in a child's mouth. And with no extra spouts, straws or pieces, the miracle 360˚ cup is easy to use and even easier to clean. We'll say cheers to that. 10 ounce capacity for water, milk or juice. By Munchkin.
